product_name: The North Face Apex Lite Jacket - Women's
long_description: Cool drizzle on the horizon? The North Face Apex Lite jacket for women shelters you from chilling moisture while you train. Front of jacket and upper arms use a specialized polyester fabric that works to block wind from chilling your core and sapping energy. Permanently embedded active microporous particles increase the surface area of the fibers in the polyester fabric, thus speeding evaporative cooling and drying. Side panels, back panels and arm panels use a polyester and elastane fabric to encourage high levels of breathability, moisture-management and ease of movement. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Chest pocket with cord exit port works with a media player. Articulated cuffs fold out over hands for warmth. Ventilation areas of the jacket align with high-heat areas of the body to help keep you dry and comfortable. The women's The North Face Apex Lite jacket features reflective hits to increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Cool drizzle on the horizon? The North Face Apex Lite jacket for women shelters you from chilling moisture while you train.
